# Epic Structure Overview

The MVP implementation is organized into 8 sequential epics that build production-ready RabbitMQ MCP Server capabilities:

1. **Foundation & MCP Protocol** - Core MCP server architecture with 3-tool semantic discovery
2. **RabbitMQ Connection Management** - Robust connection handling with auto-reconnection
3. **Topology Operations** - Queue, exchange, and binding management with safety validations
4. **Message Publishing & Consumption** - AMQP messaging operations with acknowledgments
5. **Console Client Interface** - Standalone CLI for direct RabbitMQ management
6. **Testing & Quality Framework** - Comprehensive test coverage (unit, integration, contract)
7. **Structured Logging & Observability** - Production-grade logging with security and compliance
8. **Documentation & Release** - Complete documentation and community preparation
